page.title: 19 Kilvington
page.content: { Kilvington}is a very small village with a population of only 35. It lies about \ a mile south of Staunton, close to a railway line. There are a few houses a WI hall and a church. Both Staunton and Kilvington are in Nottinghamshire. {Arts and Crafts. There are no particular crafts associated with the area.Many people pursue craft-type hobbies and some people have occupations of an artistic or craft-type nature.These include an interior designer, graphic designer, teachers and a fashion designer. {Science and Technology. Quite a few residents work away from the area in industries involved with science and technology.One in the area is Artistic Iron Products which make horse drawn carriages and have supplied 4 to the Duke of Edinburgh.
